Package com.onarandombox.multiverseinventories.profile

Interface ProfileDataSource

  • public interface ProfileDataSource
    A source for updating and retrieving player profiles via persistence.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void clearProfileCache​(ProfileKey key)
      Clears a single profile in cache.
      GlobalProfile getGlobalProfile​(java.lang.String playerName)
      Deprecated.
      UUID must be supported now.

      Retrieves the global profile for a player which contains meta-data for the player.

      Retrieves a PlayerProfile from the data source.
      void migratePlayerData​(java.lang.String oldName, java.lang.String newName, java.util.UUID playerUUID, boolean removeOldData)
      Copies all the data belonging to oldName to newName and removes the old data.

    • Method Detail

      • updatePlayerData

        void updatePlayerData​(PlayerProfile playerProfile)
        Updates the persisted data for a player for a specific profile.
        Parameters:
        playerProfile - The profile for the player that is being updated.

      • getPlayerData

        PlayerProfile getPlayerData​(ContainerType containerType,
                            java.lang.String dataName,
                            ProfileType profileType,
                            java.util.UUID playerUUID)
        Retrieves a PlayerProfile from the data source.
        Parameters:
        containerType - The type of container this profile is part of, world or group.
        dataName - World/Group to retrieve from.
        profileType - The type of profile to load data for, typically based on game mode.
        playerUUID - UUID of the player to retrieve for.
        Returns:
        The player as returned from data. If no data was found, a new PlayerProfile will be created.

      • removePlayerData

        boolean removePlayerData​(ContainerType containerType,
                         java.lang.String dataName,
                         ProfileType profileType,
                         java.lang.String playerName)
        Removes the persisted data for a player for a specific profile.
        Parameters:
        containerType - The type of container this profile is part of, world or group.
        dataName - The name of the world/group the player's data is associated with.
        profileType - The type of profile we're removing, as per ProfileType. If null, this will remove remove all profile types.
        playerName - The name of the player whose data is being removed.
        Returns:
        True if successfully removed.

      • getGlobalProfile

        @Deprecated
GlobalProfile getGlobalProfile​(java.lang.String playerName)
        Deprecated.
        UUID must be supported now.
        Retrieves the global profile for a player which contains meta-data for the player.
        Parameters:
        playerName - The name of player to retrieve for.
        Returns:
        The global profile for the specified player.

      • getGlobalProfile

        GlobalProfile getGlobalProfile​(java.lang.String playerName,
                               java.util.UUID playerUUID)
        Retrieves the global profile for a player which contains meta-data for the player.
        Parameters:
        playerName - The name of the player to retrieve for. This is required for updating name last known as.
        playerUUID - The UUID of the player.
        Returns:
        the global profile for the player with the given UUID.

      • updateGlobalProfile

        boolean updateGlobalProfile​(GlobalProfile globalProfile)
        Update the file for a player's global profile.
        Parameters:
        globalProfile - The GlobalProfile object to update the file for.
        Returns:
        True if data successfully saved to file.

      • updateLastWorld

        void updateLastWorld​(java.lang.String playerName,
                     java.lang.String worldName)
        A convenience method to update the GlobalProfile of a player with a specified world.
        Parameters:
        playerName - The player whose global profile this will update.
        worldName - The world to update the global profile with.

      • setLoadOnLogin

        void setLoadOnLogin​(java.lang.String playerName,
                    boolean loadOnLogin)
        A convenience method for setting whether player data should be loaded on login for the specified player.
        Parameters:
        playerName - The player whose data should be loaded.
        loadOnLogin - Whether or not to load on login.

      • migratePlayerData

        void migratePlayerData​(java.lang.String oldName,
                       java.lang.String newName,
                       java.util.UUID playerUUID,
                       boolean removeOldData)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Copies all the data belonging to oldName to newName and removes the old data.
        Parameters:
        oldName - the previous name of the player.
        newName - the new name of the player.
        playerUUID - the UUID of the player.
        removeOldData - whether or not to remove the data belonging to oldName.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if something goes wrong while migrating the files.

      • clearProfileCache

        void clearProfileCache​(ProfileKey key)
        Clears a single profile in cache.
